rooms.description: Art Deco inspired entrance with elegant geometric patterns and polished marble flooring. Wheelchair accessible, wide entryway.
Spacious Art Deco living area with decorative motifs, built-in shelves, and ample natural light from large windows. Adjacent to the central courtyard for ventilation and sunlight adherence to Vastu.
Sleek dining space with Art Deco elements, adjoining the living room, featuring a built-in bar counter.
Modern kitchen designed for wheelchair accessibility. Incorporates open design and Vastu principles by placing it in the south-east quadrant with proper ventilation.
Open space serving as central courtyard, providing natural light and air circulation, aligned with Vastu for positive energy flow. Incorporates water features following Art Deco design.
Comfortable guest bedroom with built-in storage; designed in Art Deco style with modern fixtures and accessible pathways.
Spacious master suite featuring an ensuite bathroom, walk-in closet, and integrated wheelchair-accessible design. Vastu compliant with the north-east alignment for health and prosperity.
Functional third bedroom, designed with Art Deco elegance and accessibility features.
Compact servant quarters with essential living facilities. Accessible via service entrance.

openings.description: Wide and wheelchair accessible door, featuring Art Deco motifs on the transom.
Large windows with decorative grilles following Art Deco design to allow natural light while preserving privacy.
Dual sliding doors providing easy access to the courtyard, enhancing connectivity between indoor and outdoor spaces.
Accessible pool entrance with steps modified for wheelchair users; designed in Art Deco style with a surrounding deck.
